24 void LoadConfig::load(const QString &base_path, const std::vector<std::string> &msg)
25 {
26  _base_path = base_path;
27  QStringList config_list;
28  for(auto it = msg.begin(); it != msg.end(); ++it) {

30  }
31  _ui.comboBox->addItems(config_list);

34 void LoadConfig::setConfigurationFile()
35 {
36  QString value = _ui.comboBox->currentText();
37  value = _base_path + "/" + value;
38  ros::param::set("/pumpkin/_config_file", value.toStdString());
39  this->accept();
40 }
